channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Horsefair street between church and Croft Drive, 8th April
item.description:
Numerous potholes and large areas of road degradation. This was reported as repaired, but lots of damaged road still needs repairing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Horsefair Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging branch, 8th April
item.description:
Overhanging branch causing hazard to wing mirrors. The many broken mirrors at this spot confirms the size of the problem

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Shrublands Leckhampton Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping of paving slabs in the Saracens car park at the top of KGV, 8th April
item.description:
Can somebody take them away please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): King George V Sports Pavilion Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo bin, 8th April
item.description:
Please can you empty the poo bin? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Little Monk Park Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole, 8th April
item.description:
A deep pothole approximately 8-10 inches deep fiddlers green lane

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Sycamore Court, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Long Potholes, 8th April
item.description:
These are multiple long potholes where old foxes have broke up on the side of the road down the hill. Tbh if a gang is going out they might as well assess the whole hill as there are quite a few dotted along the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Salterley Grange Salterley Grange, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 7th April
item.description:
Before the hedges get greened up, would be great if this area could have litter picked up and also take away all the various pieces of debris and left over signs etc removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Gilpin Avenue, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface around roundabout, 7th April
item.description:
Please could you look to repair the surface in various parts around the roundabout
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Barnett Way, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Left hand traffic light column not working.

item.title: A40 Lansdown Road - abandoned roadworks sign, 7th April
item.description:
GL51 6QR - Abandoned (broken) triangular black plastic roadworks sign - lying on pavement at end of railway bridge in Lansdown Road (A40), opposite junction with Shelburne Road, by escooter station / adjacent to concrete wall to railway bridge. Sign been there for several weeks - needs removing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Lansdown Castle Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 7th April
item.description:
Quite severe holes have opened up along this street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 39 Malden Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large potholes, 7th April
item.description:
These potholes just keep growing, all the way up Prestbury Road to Cromwell Road, meaning drivers either need to sacrifice their cars into the potholes or drive down the middle of the road to straddle and avoid them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 44 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large numerous potholes, 7th April
item.description:
Potholes have been there for at least 6 months and getting worse especially when bin lorries use the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 138 Golden Vale, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road falling apart, 6th April
item.description:
And has been for several months despite numerous reports.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29a Leckhampton Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Road in a really bad state, 6th April
item.description:
Numerous potholes clustered together - impossible to avoid - please can this be mended?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Old Bath Road, Naunton Park

item.title: Broken bollard, 6th April
item.description:
On left side of road, coming from town centre

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29 London Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Poor quality road surface in middle lane just after bridge., 6th April

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Gloucester
